ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | cosargd.1 | |- ( ph -> X e. CC ) |
| 2 |  | cosargd.2 | |- ( ph -> X =/= 0 ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_cosargd | |- ( ph -> ( cos ` ( Im ` ( log ` X ) ) ) = ( ( Re ` X ) / ( abs ` X ) ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_eqeq1d | |- ( ph -> ( ( cos ` ( Im ` ( log ` X ) ) ) = 0 <-> ( ( Re ` X ) / ( abs ` X ) ) = 0 ) ) |
| 5 | 1 | #P_recld | |- ( ph -> ( Re ` X ) e. RR ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_recnd | |- ( ph -> ( Re ` X ) e. CC ) |
| 7 | 1 | #P_abscld | |- ( ph -> ( abs ` X ) e. RR ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_recnd | |- ( ph -> ( abs ` X ) e. CC ) |
| 9 | 1, 2 | #P_absne0d | |- ( ph -> ( abs ` X ) =/= 0 ) |
| 10 | 6, 8, 9 | #P_diveq0ad | |- ( ph -> ( ( ( Re ` X ) / ( abs ` X ) ) = 0 <-> ( Re ` X ) = 0 ) ) |
| 11 | 4, 10 | #P_bitrd | |- ( ph -> ( ( cos ` ( Im ` ( log ` X ) ) ) = 0 <-> ( Re ` X ) = 0 ) ) |
